title: Bus's boarded window
content:
Bus's boarded window Crop Pickers -
Old womyn in stooped labor Luscious fields
Overshadowed by brown cracked
Hands.

The sun was bright
My back ached in harmony
This blue blazing coast
Still green country, rich manured
Soil accepting ashes of lost people
Found through easy wages.

https://youtu.be/vFJU4MFYrwI
